'''Zero Hour Invokation''' is a part of the [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!]] event in [[Version 3.7]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Duel! The Summoners' Summit! Zero Hour Invokation 1.png
|text1  = You can take part in "Zero Hour Invokation" in any of the cities in which the King of Invokations Grand Prix is being held.
|image2 = Tutorial Duel! The Summoners' Summit! Zero Hour Invokation 2.png
|text2  = In Zero Hour Invokation matches, you will not use the deck that you collected yourself. Instead, you will select 3 out of 8 incomplete decks to form a full deck, which will then allow you to take part in duels.
|image3 = Tutorial Duel! The Summoners' Summit! Zero Hour Invokation 3.png
|text3  = You can check the special rules and select the match difficulty before starting a Zero Hour Invokation match.
}}

==Stages==
===Cheerful Torchbearer===
Unlocks 2023-05-25 10{{Colon}}00

Cheerful Torchbearer is a player from Mondstadt. This player is an old hand at the game and not to be underestimated.<br>
Opponent: {{Character|Amber|nobr=1}}

;Special Rules
[[File:Duel! The Summoners' Summit! Zero Hour Invokation Stage 1.png|x150px|link=]]
* At the start of the first Action Phase, both players will get 2 charges of energy for all Character Cards.
* Neither player will have to roll for Elemental Dice in the Roll Phase. Instead, the rolls will be substituted by 8 Omni Element Dice.
